title: website: Gerrit tarballs for the base packages aren't deterministic
body:
Downloading this URL: https://go.googlesource.com/net/+archive/d75b190.tar.gz?dummy=/golang-net-d75b190.tgz
always produces a different tar archive. Contents are the same, but tar metadata is different. This prevents using such URLs as fingerprinted distfiles in FreeBSD.

It might be that https://go.googlesource.com uses BSD tar that suffers from this bug: https://github.com/libarchive/libarchive/pull/623 (in this case the fix is switching to GNU tar).

Please either fix this, or provide an alternative URL.
